highlights: Designed Buildkite CI test in Python for GitHub to identify PII usage across 1000+ Dbt SQL models using YAML metadata from Datahub.
Used Airflow and Dbt to gather freshness information of Dbt models and source data using Snowflake metadata, and provide multiple engineering and BI teams clarity on data freshness.
Performed cost analysis on companyâ€™s Dbt usage and investigated benefits of horizontal/vertical scaling within Snowflake.

Prepared new region infrastructure in Snowflake, involving the configuration of Snowflake roles, databases, tables, and warehouses using Terraform, +1000 Dbt model migration, and coordination of analysts and engineering teams across the company to determine prioritization of the given tasks.
Created multiple ELT processes using Dbt by request for analysts across the company, improving data transparency, processing efficiency, and availability of company analytics.
Designed and troubleshooted Looker dashboards for analysts to understand company data.
Designed algorithm in Python to associate blockchain transactions/movements to users, gathering evidence for fraud investigations clients requested.
Worked on refactoring and documenting a research-grade C# project used to generate mark-up and mark-down pricing data of municipal bond sales from financial institutions.
Worked on React dashboard using PostgreSQL databases to display ETL job statuses, user database permissions, and service-level agreements (SLAs) using Kubernetes, Docker, and Datadog
